    • Method Detail

      • isPath

        public static boolean isPath(java.lang.String arg)
        checks if the given argument is a path string
        Parameters:
        arg - string to check
        Returns:
        true if the given argument is a path, false if not.

      • isAbsolutePath

        public static boolean isAbsolutePath(java.lang.String arg)
        checks if the given argument is an absolute path string. absolute paths are formatted in the following way: /VirtualDisk:/Directory/Directory/.../Directory/
        Parameters:
        arg - string to check
        Returns:
        true if the given argument is an absolute path string, false if not

      • getVfsName

        public static java.lang.String getVfsName(java.lang.String absolutePath)
        extracts the virtual file system name from an absolute path string
        Parameters:
        absolutePath - string containing an absolute path
        Returns:
        virtual file system name at the begining of the absolute path string. null if the given string argument is not formatted correctly.

      • getAbsolutePathFromAbsolutePathName

        public static java.lang.String getAbsolutePathFromAbsolutePathName(java.lang.String absolutePathName)
        extracts the absolute path from an absolute path name. if the given argument is "disk1:/A/B/file" the return string is "disk1:/A/B/"
        Parameters:
        absolutePathName - string containing an absolute path name
        Returns:
        the absolute path corresponding to the given absolute path name

      • getNameFromAbsolutePathName

        public static java.lang.String getNameFromAbsolutePathName(java.lang.String absolutePathName)
        extracts the name from an absolute path name. if the given argument is "disk1:/A/B/file" the return string is "file"
        Parameters:
        absolutePathName - string containing an absolute path name
        Returns:
        the name corresponding to the given absolute path name

      • getPathFromPathName

        public static java.lang.String getPathFromPathName(java.lang.String pathName)
        extracts the path from a path name. if the given argument is "A/B/file" the return string is "A/B/"
        Parameters:
        pathName - string containing a path name
        Returns:
        the path corresponding to the given path name

      • getNameFromPathName

        public static java.lang.String getNameFromPathName(java.lang.String pathName)
        extracts the name from a path name. if the given argument is "A/B/file" the return string is "file"
        Parameters:
        pathName - string containing a path name
        Returns:
        the name corresponding to the given path name
